panels.scene: A dark, star-filled sky with a full moon illuminating the cityscape below. Thanos stands atop a skyscraper, his menacing gaze fixed on the Earth.

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.text: I will finally have my revenge!

panels.scene: Iron Man and Spider-Man swing into view, ready for action. Iron Man's suit glows with a blue and red hue, while Spider-Man's suit is a vibrant red and blue.
The superheroes land on the rooftop, facing Thanos. Iron Man's suit emits a powerful blast, pushing Thanos back.

dialogue.speaker: Iron Man
dialogue.text: We won't let you harm the Earth!

panels.scene: Thanos launches a counterattack, sending Iron Man and Spider-Man flying.
The superheroes regain their footing, ready for another round.
Thanos fires a powerful beam at the Earth. Spider-Man and Iron Man team up to block the attack.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: A solar system is a group of planets that orbit a star, just like Earth orbits the Sun!

panels.scene: The battle continues as Thanos unleashes a barrage of attacks.
Iron Man and Spider-Man dodge and counterattack, using their powers to protect the Earth.
Thanos fires a powerful blast that sends the superheroes tumbling.
Spider-Man and Iron Man regroup, planning their next move.

dialogue.speaker: Spider-Man
dialogue.text: We need to find a way to end this!

panels.scene: Iron Man flies up, unleashing a powerful blast at Thanos.
Thanos deflects the attack, sending Iron Man crashing to the ground.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: The Sun, the center of our solar system, provides light and heat for the planets to orbit around.

panels.scene: Spider-Man swings in, ready for a final showdown.
Thanos and Spider-Man engage in an intense battle, with the fate of the Earth hanging in the balance.

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.text: You are no match for me!

panels.scene: Spider-Man manages to trap Thanos in a web, holding him in place.
Iron Man flies up, ready to deliver the final blow.
Iron Man unleashes a powerful blast, destroying Thanos' weapon.

dialogue.speaker: Iron Man
dialogue.text: Thanos, your reign of terror is over!

panels.scene: The superheroes celebrate their victory, with the Earth safe once again.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: The planets in a solar system have unique characteristics, such as size, temperature, and atmosphere.

panels.scene: The superheroes reflect on their victory, knowing that they must always be ready for the next threat.
Spider-Man agrees, knowing that they can always count on each other.
The camera zooms out, showing the Earth from space, with the solar system visible in the background.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Our solar system is just one of many in the universe.

panels.scene: Dr. Gyaan stands in front of a chalkboard, ready to explain more about the solar system.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: There are eight planets in our solar system, each with its own unique features.

panels.scene: Dr. Gyaan writes the names of the planets on the chalkboard, starting with Mercury and ending with Neptune.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune.

panels.scene: The superheroes listen intently, eager to learn more.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: The solar system is a fascinating place, full of mysteries and wonders. Keep exploring, and you'll discover something new!
